<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===- HexagonHardwareLoops.cpp - Identify and generate hardware loops ----===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass identifies loops where we can generate the Hexagon hardware</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop instruction.  The hardware loop can perform loop branches with a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// zero-cycle overhead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The pattern that defines the induction variable can changed depending on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// prior optimizations.  For example, the IndVarSimplify phase run by &#39;opt&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// normalizes induction variables, and the Loop Strength Reduction pass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// run by &#39;llc&#39; may also make changes to the induction variable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The pattern detected by this phase is due to running Strength Reduction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Criteria for hardware loops:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - Countable loops (w/ ind. var for a trip count)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - Assumes loops are normalized by IndVarSimplify</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - Try inner-most loops first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - No function calls in loops.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoninstrinfo-h">HexagonInstrInfo.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonsubtarget-h">HexagonSubtarget.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Fix the data flow of the induction variable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The desired flow is: phi ---&gt; bump -+-&gt; comparison-in-latch.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///                                     |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///                                     +-&gt; back to phi</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// where &quot;bump&quot; is the increment of the induction variable:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///   iv = iv + #const.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Due to some prior code transformations, the actual flow may look</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///   phi -+-&gt; bump ---&gt; back to phi</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///        |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///        +-&gt; comparison-in-latch (against upper&#95;bound-bump),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// i.e. the comparison that controls the loop execution may be using</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// the value of the induction variable from before the increment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Return true if the loop&#39;s flow is the desired one (i.e. it&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// either been fixed, or no fixing was necessary).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Otherwise, return false.  This can happen if the induction variable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// couldn&#39;t be identified, or if the value in the latch&#39;s comparison</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// cannot be adjusted to reflect the post-bump value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> fixupInductionVariable(MachineLoop &#42;L);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Given a loop, if it does not have a preheader, create one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Return the block that is the preheader.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MachineBasicBlock &#42;createPreheaderForLoop(MachineLoop &#42;L);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonhardwareloops-cpp-/hexagonhardwareloops/#ac40b8dc6f6e7f12eee455df7fdd5acaa">HexagonHardwareLoops::ID</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef NDEBUG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonhardwareloops-cpp-/hexagonhardwareloops/#aa2b7e4cd01f1099b9b7b906c0185377f">HexagonHardwareLoops::Counter</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pair represents an induction register together with an immediate</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mapping:  R.next -&gt; (R, bump), where R, R.next and bump are derived</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from an induction operation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   R.next = R + bump</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// where bump is an immediate value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">InductionMap = std::map&lt;Register, RegisterBump&gt;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sadly, the following code gets information based on the position</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memprof/#abee3ddc7c6eb611a3b96fb69489c81caaa6122a65eaa676f700ae68d393054a37">Start</a>-&gt;isImm() &amp;&amp; End-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a76f61c6784df6dc8402a8b9011041926">isImm</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Both, start and end are immediates.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t StartV = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memprof/#abee3ddc7c6eb611a3b96fb69489c81caaa6122a65eaa676f700ae68d393054a37">Start</a>-&gt;getImm();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t EndV = End-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a38b28a85f818b49d8806c150b8a5b4f7">getImm</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t Dist = EndV - StartV;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Dist == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Exact = (Dist % IVBump) == 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Cmp == Comparison::NE) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Exact)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Dist &lt; 0) ^ (IVBump &lt; 0))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For comparisons that include the final value (i.e. include equality</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with the final value), we need to increase the distance by 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CmpHasEqual)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Dist = Dist &gt; 0 ? Dist+1 : Dist-1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For the loop to iterate, CmpLess should imply Dist &gt; 0  Similarly,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CmpGreater should imply Dist &lt; 0  These conditions could actually</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fail, for example, in unreachable code (which may still appear to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reachable in the CFG).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((CmpLess &amp;&amp; Dist &lt; 0) || (CmpGreater &amp;&amp; Dist &gt; 0))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;Normalized&quot; distance, i.e. with the bump set to +-1.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t Dist1 = (IVBump &gt; 0) ? (Dist +  (IVBump - 1)) / IVBump</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 : (-Dist + (-IVBump - 1)) / (-IVBump);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a> (Dist1 &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Fishy thing.  Both operands have the same sign.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> = Dist1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> &gt; 0xFFFFFFFFULL)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">new</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonhardwareloops-cpp-/countvalue/#a66fef39198308ece0886c1a8d9dd01b4">CountValue</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonhardwareloops-cpp-/countvalue/#a166f175f1b7295c1554e82a88c301afda0eab7abb598e17b8106a9748e6286860">CountValue::CV&#95;Immediate</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A general case: Start and End are some values, but the actual</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// iteration count may not be available.  If it is not, insert</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a computation of it into the preheader.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the induction variable bump is not a power of 2, quit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Othwerise we&#39;d need a general integer division.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a434f6a0d80fb13e4326e848a6391f057">isPowerOf2&#95;64</a>(std::abs(IVBump)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;PH = MLI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineloopinfo/#a80b0e6e28849491c5b267be8ffc909b4">findLoopPreheader</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>, <a href="#aaaa380d3bca284777176a4284a938177">SpecPreheader</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a> (PH &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Should have a preheader by now&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> InsertPos = PH-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a7f0521fa2de44271fd4b909ea7351ef3">getFirstTerminator</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugloc">DebugLoc</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InsertPos != PH-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acbc921830578e2741be6549db716c0ce">end</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a> = InsertPos-&gt;getDebugLoc();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If Start is an immediate and End is a register, the trip count</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will be &quot;reg - imm&quot;.  Hexagon&#39;s &quot;subtract immediate&quot; instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is actually &quot;reg + -imm&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="847"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the loop IV is going downwards, i.e. if the bump is negative,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then the iteration count (computed as End-Start) will need to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// negated.  To avoid the negation, just swap Start and End.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IVBump &lt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(Start, End);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><span class="doxyHighlight">    IVBump = -IVBump;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(CmpLess, CmpGreater);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Cmp may now have a wrong direction, e.g.  LEs may now be GEs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Signedness, and &quot;including equality&quot; are preserved.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RegToImm = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memprof/#abee3ddc7c6eb611a3b96fb69489c81caaa6122a65eaa676f700ae68d393054a37">Start</a>-&gt;isReg() &amp;&amp; End-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a76f61c6784df6dc8402a8b9011041926">isImm</a>(); </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for (reg..imm)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RegToReg = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memprof/#abee3ddc7c6eb611a3b96fb69489c81caaa6122a65eaa676f700ae68d393054a37">Start</a>-&gt;isReg() &amp;&amp; End-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a4c9594c955fec80c73ddd964b5efd554">isReg</a>(); </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for (reg..reg)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t StartV = 0, EndV = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memprof/#abee3ddc7c6eb611a3b96fb69489c81caaa6122a65eaa676f700ae68d393054a37">Start</a>-&gt;isImm())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><span class="doxyHighlight">    StartV = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memprof/#abee3ddc7c6eb611a3b96fb69489c81caaa6122a65eaa676f700ae68d393054a37">Start</a>-&gt;getImm();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (End-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a76f61c6784df6dc8402a8b9011041926">isImm</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><span class="doxyHighlight">    EndV = End-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a38b28a85f818b49d8806c150b8a5b4f7">getImm</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t AdjV = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To compute the iteration count, we would need this computation:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Count = (End - Start + (IVBump-1)) / IVBump</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or, when CmpHasEqual:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Count = (End - Start + (IVBump-1)+1) / IVBump</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The &quot;IVBump-1&quot; part is the adjustment (AdjV).  We can avoid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// generating an instruction specifically to add it if we can adjust</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the immediate values for Start or End.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CmpHasEqual) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Need to add 1 to the total iteration count.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memprof/#abee3ddc7c6eb611a3b96fb69489c81caaa6122a65eaa676f700ae68d393054a37">Start</a>-&gt;isImm())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><span class="doxyHighlight">      StartV--;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (End-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a76f61c6784df6dc8402a8b9011041926">isImm</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EndV++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><span class="doxyHighlight">      AdjV += 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Cmp != Comparison::NE) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memprof/#abee3ddc7c6eb611a3b96fb69489c81caaa6122a65eaa676f700ae68d393054a37">Start</a>-&gt;isImm())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><span class="doxyHighlight">      StartV -= (IVBump-1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (End-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a76f61c6784df6dc8402a8b9011041926">isImm</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EndV += (IVBump-1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><span class="doxyHighlight">      AdjV += (IVBump-1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SR = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memprof/#abee3ddc7c6eb611a3b96fb69489c81caaa6122a65eaa676f700ae68d393054a37">Start</a>-&gt;isReg()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memprof/#abee3ddc7c6eb611a3b96fb69489c81caaa6122a65eaa676f700ae68d393054a37">Start</a>-&gt;getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SR = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memprof/#abee3ddc7c6eb611a3b96fb69489c81caaa6122a65eaa676f700ae68d393054a37">Start</a>-&gt;getSubReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="996"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="997"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="998"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass">TargetRegisterClass</a> &#42;PredRC = &amp;Hexagon::PredRegsRegClass;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="999"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> MuxR = CountR;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1000"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MuxSR = CountSR;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1001"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For the loop count to be valid unsigned number, CmpLess should imply</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1002"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Dist &gt;= 0 Similarly, CmpGreater should imply Dist &lt; 0 We can skip the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1003"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// check if the initial distance is zero and the comparison is LTu || LTEu.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1004"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memprof/#abee3ddc7c6eb611a3b96fb69489c81caaa6122a65eaa676f700ae68d393054a37">Start</a>-&gt;isImm() &amp;&amp; StartV == 0 &amp;&amp; Comparison::isUnsigned(Cmp) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1005"><span class="doxyHighlight">        CmpLess) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1006"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (CmpLess || CmpGreater)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1424"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HexagonHardwareLoops::phiMayWrapOrUnderflow(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1427"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a379bee2dadbfd1d7a599f003c4275dd8">Phi</a>-&gt;isPHI() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expecting a Phi.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1437"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1438"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Return true if the induction variable can underflow in the first iteration.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1439"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// An example, is an initial unsigned value that is 0 and is decrement in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1440"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// first itertion of a do-while loop.  In this case, we cannot generate a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1441"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// hardware loop because the endloop instruction does not decrement the loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1442"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// counter if it is &lt;= 1 We only need to perform this analysis if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1443"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// initial value is a register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1444"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1445"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This function assumes the initial value may underfow unless proven</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1446"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// otherwise. If the type is signed, then we don&#39;t care because signed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1447"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// underflow is undefined. We attempt to prove the initial value is not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1448"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// zero by perfoming a crude analysis of the loop counter. This function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1449"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// checks if the initial value is used in any comparison prior to the loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1450"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and, if so, assumes the comparison is a range check. This is inexact,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1451"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// but will catch the simple cases.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1452"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HexagonHardwareLoops::loopCountMayWrapOrUnderFlow(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1453"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &#42;InitVal, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &#42;EndVal,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1464"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// won&#39;t underflow in the first iteration.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1708"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The latch/exit block does not go back to the header.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1823"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1824"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1826"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1827"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1828"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It is not valid to do this transformation on an unsigned comparison</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1829"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because it may underflow.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1830"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Comparison::Kind <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86/#a86730e94ae6fdf0fe3145b2acc88dea8ac9b4c62f6dc1bc5caf3c768b687cbf7e">Cmp</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1831"><span class="doxyHighlight">          getComparisonKind(PredDef-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a0363204b5fbab08a46f5a7cd7f376f78">getOpcode</a>(), </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1832"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Cmp || Comparison::isUnsigned(Cmp))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1833"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1834"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1835"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the register is being compared against an immediate, try changing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1836"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the compare instruction to use induction register and adjust the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1837"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// immediate operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1838"><span class="doxyHighlight">      int64&#95;t CmpImm = getImmediate(&#42;CmpImmOp);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1839"><span class="doxyHighlight">      int64&#95;t V = RB.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1840"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Handle Overflow (64-bit).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1841"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (((V &gt; 0) &amp;&amp; (CmpImm &gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#ad0d744f05898e32d01f73f8af3cd2071">INT64&#95;MAX</a> - V)) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1842"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ((V &lt; 0) &amp;&amp; (CmpImm &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#ab21f12f372f67b8ff0aa3432336ede67">INT64&#95;MIN</a> - V)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1843"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1844"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CmpImm += V;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1845"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Most comparisons of register against an immediate value allow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1846"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the immediate to be constant-extended. There are some exceptions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1847"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// though. Make sure the new combination will work.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1848"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CmpImmOp-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a76f61c6784df6dc8402a8b9011041926">isImm</a>() &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;isExtendable(&#42;PredDef) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1849"><span class="doxyHighlight">          !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;isValidOffset(PredDef-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a0363204b5fbab08a46f5a7cd7f376f78">getOpcode</a>(), CmpImm, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1850"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1851"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1852"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure that the compare happens after the bump.  Otherwise,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1853"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// after the fixup, the compare would use a yet-undefined register.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1855"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Order = orderBumpCompare(BumpI, PredDef);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1856"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Order)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1857"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1858"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1859"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Finally, fix the compare instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1860"><span class="doxyHighlight">      setImmediate(&#42;CmpImmOp, CmpImm);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1861"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO : PredDef-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a999b8f3e58e7ca479f26445bae791a7c">operands</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1862"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a4c9594c955fec80c73ddd964b5efd554">isReg</a>() &amp;&amp; MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>() == RB.first) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1865"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
